1.title: Einstein's Moustache

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Gil finds Flint's most prized possession: Einstein's moustache. When he starts wearing it, Shelbourne takes him for a fellow principal, and they bond.

2.title: Power Struggle

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: When Flint's inventing makes the power bill skyrocket, Tim takes the Lockwood house off the grid.

3.title: Brentonium

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Flint helps Brent with his science project, inadvertently inventing a cool new element in the process-for which Brent takes all the credit.

4.title: Penguipocalypse

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Sam receives a pet penguin from her Pet of the Month Club, unaware of Swallow Falls' long and terrible history with the aquatic bird.

5.title: Dance Fish Move Dance

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Mayor Shelbourne suffers a crisis of leadership when Flint beats his high score on the arcade's most difficult game.

6.title: Sonny with a Chance of Disappointment

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: When Flint totals Tim's boat, he uses a ray to make his dad forget about the crash-and ends up erasing all of Tim's memories of Flint as his son.

7.title: Sam's Imaginary Friend

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: Flint invents a machine to bring Sam's imaginary friend, Patootie, into the real world, but Patootie's possessiveness is more than Flint can handle.

8.title: Hands Up

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Flint realizes that all of the world's great inventors have large hands, so he invents a way to supersize his own mitts.

9.title: Brent Hog Day

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: During Swallow Falls' annual Brent Hog Day festivities, Sam sets out to reveal that the beloved celebration is a scam.

10.title: Baby Talk

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: When Flint creates an invention to make Earl believe his son, Cal, can talk, Earl goes overboard showing off his genius baby.

11.title: Now You See Him

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: When Mayor Shelbourne incorrectly believes Flint's invention has made him invisible, he lives out his dream and goes on a tear through the town.

12.title: Major Science

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Desperate to make science interesting to his peers, Flint creates the superhero alter ego "Major Science."

13.title: Something Fishy

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: While trying out an invention to help his dad learn to swim, Flint accidentally turns Tim into a fish.

14.title: Out to Flunch

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: When Shelbourne confiscates Flint's beloved new invention, Sam organizes a heist to get it back.

15.title: The Kid's Got Moxy

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: When Flint's new invention gives Gil some much-needed confidence, the mayor demands a moxy-boost of his own.

16.title: The New, New Girl

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: Sam tries to help a new student settle into Swallow Falls, only to discover the townspeople are much nicer to the new girl than they ever were to her.

17.title: Stormwave and Thunderhawk

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: When Sam decides she wants a cool nickname, she and Flint struggle to jump through the hoops required to earn it.

18.title: Squirrels Just Wanna Have Fun

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: Brent offers to rid Flint's lab of a squirrel infestation, but his "help" only makes the problem worse.

19.title: Sardine: The Movie

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: Flint and Sam enter Brent's dreams to determine the source of Brent's sudden fear of sardines.

20.title: The Boy Who Cried Robot

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: Flint suspects that Shelbourne may be a robot, but the mayor does his best to make sure no one in town believes him.

21.title: Fizzy Fish

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

21.plot: When the Fizzy Fish soda corporation takes over Cannery High, Flint and Sam take their protest right to the top.

22.title: Fluber

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

22.plot: Flint revolutionizes transportation in Swallow Falls by harnessing the power of ratbirds.

23.title: Timmy Rockgood

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

23.plot: When Tim brushes off his guitar and revitalizes his classic rock act, Flint attempts to modernize his dad's outdated sound.

24.title: Swallow Fails

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

24.plot: Tired of being the butt of the world's jokes, Swallow Falls comes together to try to show how great their island really is.

25.title: Poppa Piglet

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

25.plot: When Mayor Shelbourne throws out Gil's favorite Poppa Piglet toys, Gil leaves home and moves in with Flint.

26.title: Mascot Wars

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

26.plot: Flint dons a worm suit to try and drum up business for his dad's bait shop, drawing the ire of the town's chief mascot, Baby Brent.

27.title: Sardinasaurus

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

27.plot: Flint tries to make up for missing Sam's birthday, but she's too busy tracking a big news story to notice.

28.title: Flint vs. Flint

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

28.plot: Flint's creation of an AI alter ego backfires when his computerized self starts taking over the real Flint's life.

29.title: An Alluring Promise

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

29.plot: Flint invents a device to help his father end his fishing dry spell, but the special lure ends up attracting people instead of sardines.

30.title: Brent Bro

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

30.plot: When Flint and Brent suspect their parents are dating, Brent takes Flint under his wing.

31.title: Sardinee Babies

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

31.plot: When a local fast food joint starts including Sardinee Babies in their meals, Sam and Flint compete to collect all 37.

32.title: Party Tron

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

32.plot: Sam pretends to be Flint's new robot, but finds herself in peril as Flint shows off what his latest "invention" can do.

33.title: The Happy Sardine

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

33.plot: When Flint's day at the beach goes sour, his dad encourages him to adopt a new "Say Yes" attitude.

34.title: Less Ordinary People

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

34.plot: After destroying the town yet again, Flint does his best to be an ordinary kid.

35.title: Flint TV

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

35.plot: Flint's new invention transports the user into any TV show they choose, but Brent's abuse of the gadget threatens to trap him in the airwaves forever.

36.title: Spa Daze

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

36.plot: Hector tricks Flint into helping him win a spot on the Shelbourne Walk of Fame, endangering the whole town in the process.

37.title: Mayor or Mayor Not

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

37.plot: Tired of Shelbourne's greedy taxes, Flint convinces his father to run for mayor.

38.title: Fisherman Sam

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

38.plot: Sam starts hanging out with a gang of gruff fishermen to get to the bottom of their uncanny ability to predict the weather.

39.title: Trees Company

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

39.plot: Brent and Flint get stuck up a tree together after one of Brent's jokes goes too far.

40.title: Tim, Jim and Kim

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

40.plot: Tensions arise when Tim's jealous brother Jim visits with his flirtatious new fiancée, Kim.

41.title: Live and Let Diary

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

41.plot: Flint, desperate to find out what Sam's giving him for his birthday, invents a device to read her diary out loud.

42.title: Rainbow Tim

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

42.plot: When Flint discovers his father only sees shades of grey, he sets out to blow Tim's mind with a device that lets him see colour.

43.title: Mermaid You Look

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

43.plot: Tim discovers a mermaid in the ocean, but skeptical Flint doesn't believe they exist.

44.title: Mrs. Tinklebottom

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

44.plot: Mr. Earl thinks of himself as the healthiest person in Swallow Falls, but he's hiding a delicious, frosting-topped secret.

45.title: Where There's a Gil There's a Way

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

45.plot: Gil takes over as principal and, much to his dad's surprise, actually improves the school...until his crush on Sam makes things weird.

46.title: Embarrass-Brent

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

46.plot: Nothing embarrasses Brent...until he tries out Flint's new self-awareness-creating invention and becomes horrified by his boorish ways.

47.title: Flint Land

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

47.plot: Flint thinks his new series of interactive science exhibits is truly making a difference, but he's actually just created a bunch of carnival rides.

48.title: Your Dad is My Dad

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

48.plot: Flint gets jealous when Tim takes Brent (and a growing group of townsfolk) under his fatherly wing.

49.title: Totally Tall Tales

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

49.plot: Townspeople recount their versions of how the island of Swallow Falls came to be.

50.title: Flint's Fabulous Future

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

50.plot: Flint creates a machine that predicts a person's future occupation, and is surprised by his own result.

51.title: Have Yourself a Sardiney Little Christmas Part 1

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

51.plot: Sam discovers that Santa Claus is vacationing in Swallow Falls and drags Flint along to pitch their Christmas ideas to the jolly old elf.

52.title: Have Yourself a Sardiney Little Christmas Part 2

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

52.plot: Flint and Sam seek out the help of an old friend to break Santa out of jail.

1.title: And the Winner Is...

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: Flint and Sam remember the time they met and how they almost destroyed their town trying to out-nerd each other.

2.title: Princess Kittymittens

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: When Flint destroys Princess Kittymittens -Sam's treasured toy- he decides to let Sam choose one of his treasured things and let her destroy it to make it up to her.

3.title: Invent This!

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: While Flint fails as an inventor, his father Tim invents a Gum Pencil, gaining a reputation as the finest inventor in town, much to Flint's chagrin.

4.title: Bacon Girl

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: When Sam reveals how much she hates sardines, the town's number one product, Flint decides to invent sardines that taste like bacon.

5.title: Who You Calling Garbage?

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Flint creates a robot capable of taking out the garbage, however, the robot decides that everyone is garbage and starts to get rid of every person in town.

6.title: The Ballad of Johnny Sardine

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Swallow Falls prepares to celebrate the birthday of its oldest sardine, a wish-granting fish named Johnny, but Flint and Sam put the entire event in jeopardy.

7.title: Millionaire Monkey

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: When Steve wins the Swallow Falls lottery townspeople line up claiming that they are Steve's best friend causing Flint to question Steve's true affections.

8.title: Baby Brent Sitter

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: Flint and Sam babysit so they can buy a new board game, but when Brent hires them as his babysitter they have to decide whether the humiliation is worth the reward.

9.title: Spoiler Orb

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Flint modifies Sam's weather-predicting orb to predict the future, but knowing their future isn't as fun as they thought it would be.

10.title: The Pandas Are Coming

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Mayor Shelbourne brings a panda to Swallow Falls, but when the town falls under the panda's spell it's up to Flint and Sam to find out what's really going on.

11.title: Inventors Only

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Flint is excited to discover there's another inventor in town, but Sam suspects the inventor has an ulterior motive for befriending Flint.

12.title: Clock-a-Doodle-Doom

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: Unable to wake up on time in the morning, Flint combines an alarm with rooster DNA to create the ultimate alarm clock.

13.title: The Sardemon

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

13.plot: Tim drags Flint out into the wilderness to participate in a Lockwood father-son tradition, trying to catch the legendary Sardemon, the largest sardine ever seen.

14.title: Earl or Pearl?

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

14.plot: Earl goes undercover as a female student named "Pearl" in order to befriend Sam and find out what Flint's planning to invent next.

15.title: Sardinefest

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

15.plot: Sam is horrified to learn about Swallow Falls' annual sardine race and sets out to stop the race in the name of animal cruelty.

16.title: Total Samesies

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

16.plot: After being teased for being too similar, Flint and Sam set out to prove that they're totally different and have other friends.

17.title: Monkey Me, Monkey You

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

17.plot: Flint accidentally combines himself with Steve and has to learn to live with the monkey inside of him.

18.title: Best Invention Ever!

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

18.plot: When Flint brags he sleep invented the best invention ever, the Mayor sees it as a money making opportunity and Flint has to figure out what he actually invented.

19.title: That's Sal, Folks!

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

19.plot: While attempting to keep Sam from moving away, Flint accidentally brings the town's sardine statue to life who starts revealing the town's secrets.

20.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Clouds

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

20.plot: Flint gives Sam a Cloud-Maker for their friendaversary, but Sam's new cloud friend won't leave her side.

21.title: The Science of the Toot

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

21.plot: Flint invents a toot inducing bean in order to become cool so his classmates will listen to him and his idea to make a science mural.

22.title: Mr. Stressup

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

22.plot: When one of Flint's inventions injures Tim, Tim's doctor says he needs to relax, and Flint has just the invention for the job!

23.title: Virtu-Earl Reality

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

23.plot: Flint and Sam scheme to get Mr. Earl to take a day off, but when they see him going crazy with boredom they feel guilty and try to fix it.

24.title: Hair We Go Again

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

24.plot: Flint invents the hair unbalder when he realizes he'll go bald one day, but Tim offers him another point of view by showing him the perks of being bald.

25.title: It's About Time

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

25.plot: Sam and Flint accidentally cryogenic-ally freeze themselves in the town's time capsule and emerge into a post-apocalyptic future.

26.title: Self-Helpie

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

26.plot: Flint invents a device that will put a good picture of him into the yearbook, but instead it puts him in every picture that has ever existed.

27.title: Happy Clappy Monkey

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

27.plot: Steve falls in love with the cymbal smashing electric monkey Flint brought in to replace Steve while he was on vacation.

28.title: Robot Rumble

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

28.plot: Flint enters his fearsome robot into a robot boxing competition and when it comes face to face with Mayor Shelbourne's robot the results are explosive.

29.title: My Pop Is Tops

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

29.plot: Flint and Gil argue over who has a better dad setting off a secret competition pitting Tim and Mayor Shelbourne against each other in a battle of parental prowess.

30.title: Clone Alone

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

30.plot: Flint accidentally makes a clone of himself and is shocked to discover his clone is more popular than he is.

31.title: Coat of Harms

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

31.plot: Sam makes Flint a new tricked-out lab coat to replace his old smelly one not realizing it was a gift from his mom.

32.title: Earl of My Dreams

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

32.plot: When Flint gets Earl in trouble with his wife, Earl demands Flint help him get back into her good graces.

33.title: Spacy Race

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

33.plot: Flint builds a spaceship for an Australian businessman, Mr. Zorbleck, who may or may not actually be Australian.

34.title: Tim and Jim

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

34.plot: Tim's rebellious brother Jim comes to visit and Jim soon becomes jealous of Tim's perfect life.

35.title: Mayornormal Activity

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

35.plot: Mayor Shelbourne buys up all the town's candy at Halloween and promises to give it all to the kid who makes it through his super scary haunted house.

36.title: Flintenstein

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

36.plot: While attempting to debunk Hollywood pseudoscience, Flint accidentally creates his own Frankenstein-like monster.

37.title: Ratbirds and Cheesyworms

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

37.plot: Flint tells Sam the story of how, and why, he invented Ratbirds.

38.title: Junk in the Trunk

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

38.plot: Flint reluctantly holds a yard sale for his old inventions and is presented with an offer he can't refuse.

39.title: The Inventor's Code

episode of.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (TV Series 2017– )

39.plot: Flint visits the other inventor in town to view his newest ideas insisting he's honor-bound to help his fellow inventors, no matter what.

imdb.plot outline: Set as a prequel to the two Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs movies, the series focuses on the adventures of Flint Lockwood and Sam Sparks as best friends in high school. While Flint wants to be a successful inventor, Sam longs for fame as a reporter.
imdb.title: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs
plot: Prequel to the 2009 film, with inventor boy Flint Lockwood and reporter girl Sam Sparks as best friends during high school.::sabri musa

Set as a prequel to the two _Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs_ (qv) movies, the series focuses on the adventures of Flint Lockwood and Sam Sparks as best friends in high school. While Flint wants to be a successful inventor, Sam longs for fame as a reporter.
